full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 188 of 236 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - cross A. Vista, California. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I'd ask for permission for Detective Byrne to take the exhibit back down and put it aside. THE COURT: Yes. Thank you. Q. Mr. Parkinson, other than your participation in the search of 358 El Brillo Way on October 20th, 2005, did you have any other involvement in the investigation of this case? A. The final recording of the walk-through showing no damage. Q. Other than that, any other involvement in this case? A. No. MS. COMEY: No further questions, your Honor. THE COURT: Thank you. Mr. Everdell, you may cross examine Mr. Parkinson. MR. EVERDELL: Thank you, your Honor. If I could deliver a binder to the witness, may I approach? THE COURT: Yes. MR. EVERDELL: May I inquire, your Honor? THE COURT: You may. CROSS-EXAMINATION BY MR. EVERDELL: Q. Good afternoon, Mr. Parkinson. A. Good afternoon, sir. Q. Mr. Parkinson, you testified on direct examination about a search warrant that you helped execute at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach residence on October 20th, 2005; is that right? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
